snippet.title: Wavetale - Stadia Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
OUT NOW on Google Stadia: https://stadia.com/link/RKSa6tHgRCjJpvBa7
Heading over to PC and Console in 2022! 

Wavetale is a third-person action-adventure game from Thunderful Studios, the creators of Lost in Random and SteamWorld.

Explore an open sea and the decaying archipelago of Strandville as you take control of Sigrid, a young girl who befriends a mysterious shadow that provides her with the power to walk on water. 

Speed through the waves, swing yourself from housetops with your net, and defeat an old nemesis to save the citizens of the islands, all with a bit of help from the shadows down below—and your cranky grandmother.
